title: How do i get a extra refund??
body: I need another refund and i've heard people talking about how they got another refund but i dont know how. Anyone??

replies.body: If you used any kind of online payment besides a prepaid RP card, you can charge back the money spent, if you really cant afford something this is your best option, but I believe Riot locks your account if you do this, I don't know why Targons Blade choose not to tell you about this option. Hope everything works out for you, best of luck. Dwagons

*Lew* is spot on with their assessment. The 3 tokens your account is given are the only exception to our [*Refund Policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any questions.
You are limited to 3 [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)tokens on an account and there isn't any way to get more once they are used.
